item.title: CVE-2021-21501|2024-08-03T18:16:22.624Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20servicecomb
item.description: Improper configuration will cause ServiceComb ServiceCenter Directory Traversal problem in ServcieCenter 1.x.x versions and fixed in 2.0.0.
